short_summary: F1652-230053 Sevices regardant l'entretien d'un canot pneumatique à coque rigide.
description: Services de rempotage d'un canot pneumatique à coque rigide
full_summary:
### Tender Notice
Below is a summary of a government tender notice.

**Project Details**
---------------------------------
* **Project Title:** F1652-230053 - Rigid Inflatable Boat Repair
* **Notice Reference:** WS4330153342-Doc4399870780
* **Publication Date:** February 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** March 13, 2024 02:00 PM (Eastern Time)

**Tender Overview**
-----------------
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) requires a contractor to repair one (1) Rigid-Hull Inflatable Boat. This involves removing the existing sponson from the vessel and installing a newly constructed sponson. The project must be completed as per the manufacturer's specifications and industry standards.

**Geographical Scope**
-------------------
The project is restricted to operation in the province of *British Columbia*, Canada. Deliveries will also need to be made to the same location.

**Tender Process**
-----------------
This tender is subject to competitive bidding with the lowest price being the selection criterion. The tender is open to all qualified contractors.

**Important Contact Information**
-------------------------------
* **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contact Name:** Wass, Patrick (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** [patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:patrick.wass@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Notice URL:** [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18784812?extsite=MTg3ODQ4MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18784812?extsite=MTg3ODQ4MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Contract Details
The expected contract start date is not specified, but the expected end date of the contract is July 25, 2024. The contract will operate under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

---


Justifies changes: 

1. Changed the title of the project from French to English, and used a more descriptive title.
2. Summarized the project description in two steps for better clarity.
3. Changed the term 'end-user entities' to 'Deliver to' for clarity.
    * Rewrote  the contact information section for better
